name: Gravity Wars (itch) (Juan Francisco Mora)
description:
Gravity Wars is a competitive game in which you will take control of a ship and you must use the gravity to aim the bullets to the opponent’s ship.

Each player will need a controller.

Key Control:

  • Left Stick: Move
  • Right Stick: Look
  • Right Trigger: Shoot
  • Keyboard: Exit the game escene
